adHeader: sheep or goat herder for 12 paradise acres
adDetails: Have 12 acres on the coast near Jenner 2 miles form ocean 1000 feet of Russian River frontage mostly fenced with 2 ponds well and the river there are several other residents on site,with no interest in land use monthly cost $750 preference for someone who has a strong interest in using the land for organic farming, livestock- goats, cattle etc ie making good use of the 12 acres no pot growing! not interested in small gardens 5 acres minimum Living quarters, you provide possibilities: 1 build your own 2 yurt or tent 3 motorhome or trailer gated access extremely private Location At the mouth of the Russian River where it enters the Pacific just north of Marin county enjoy kayaking on either the river or the ocean fantastic hiking, rock climbing 1/2 mile to Goat Rock State Park PLEASE NOTE: it is 40 minutes from Santa Rosa, 60 minutes from San Rafael and 90 minutes from San Francisco in non rush hour traffic Pictures show views of property beach views are at nearby Sonoma State Goat Rock Park, 1/2 mile away Requirements: must have farm experience and references
